Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24

Package view.GUI

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GUIController
    the interface implemented in every GUI Controller of the game
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GUI
    manages the GUI start and the change of the current GUI screen
    GUIBoard
    This class represents the GUI controller during the real game (after the pick god phase)
    GUIConnection
    This class represents the GUI controller during the connection phase
    GUIConnectionError
    This class represents the GUI controller during a connection error
    GUICredits
    This class represents the GUI controller in the Credits screen
    GUIGodSelection
    This class represents the GUI controller during the god selection phase
    GUIMenu
    This class represents the GUI controller of the menu
    GUIPickGod
    This class represents the GUI controller during the pick god phase
    GUIScreenFactory
    A factory for GUIScreen (factory pattern)
    GUIWinner
    This class represents the GUI controller at the end of a game
